markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, desire and greed for intention regarding sights, intention regarding sounds, intention regarding smells, intention regarding tastes, intention regarding touches, or intention regarding thoughts is a corruption of the mind. …”

SN.27.8. Taṇhāsutta (“Craving”)
